nodes.text: The Kellmer Institute of Galactic History was one of the premier history and government research institutes in the galaxy.

Funded primarily by the New Republic as a General Ministry Institute, the Kellmer Institute was responsible for a number of detailed reports on the history of the New Republic and was renown for its government, history and public affairs curricula. It maintained a branch office on Ryloth, which was built in 27 ABY.
